Translations.Text: Ta, "Ne porushuyutʹ proty BOHA. YA prynoshu do vas potuzhni dokazy
ya shukayu prytulku u moyomu Lordi ta vashomu Lordi, yakshcho vy protystavlyayete meni
Yakshcho vy ne bazhayete poviryty, todi prosto vid'yidzhayete meni yedyni
Z·hodom, vin blahav yoho Lorda: "Tse - bezputni lyudy
(Boh skazav,) "Peresuvannya z Moyimy sluzhbovtsyamy pid chas nochi; vy budete peresliduvatysya
Peresikayutʹ more shvydko; yikhniy viysʹko bude tonutysya
Otzhe, vony obihnaly bahato parku ta pruzhyn
Zerno ta rozkishne zhyttya
Blahoslovennya shcho vony otrymaly nasolodu
Vsi tsi my vyklykaly buty uspadkovani inshymy lyudʹmy
Ni nebesa, ni zemlya plakala nad nymy, ta vony ne respited
Tym chasom, my vryatuvaly Ditey Izrayilya z prynyzhuyuchoho persecution
Z Pharaoh; vin buv tyran
My vybraly yikh z chysla vsikh lyudey, znayucho
My pokazaly yim tak bahato dokaziv, kotryy utvoryuvaly velykyy test
nynishni heneratsiyi kazhutʹ
My tilʹky vmyrayemo persha smertʹ; my budemo nikoly resurrected
Prynosyte nazad nash forefathers, yakshcho vy ye pravdyvi
vony krashche nizh lyudy Tubba` ta inshi pered tym, yak yim? My vynyshchyly yikh dlya yikhnikh zlochyniv
My ne utvoryly nebo ta zemlyu, ta vse mizh nymy, tilʹky hraty
My utvoryly yikh dlya spetsyfichnoyi mety, ale bilʹshistʹ yikh ne znayemo
